name: Disciple Starla
description: Eager and devout, quick to find signs everywhere.

name: Brother Nimbus
description: Smooth talker, always with an eye on his own gain.

name: Visionary Valda
description: Elderly and intense. Insists her visions reveal hidden truths.

name: Sheriff Callum Briggs
description: Unimpressed with cults. Keeps his distance, but watches closely.

name: Tabitha Duane
description: Worried mother, ready to do whatever it takes to get her son back.

name: Journalist Lana Cross
description: Relentless reporter, sensing her next big story in the cultâ€™s secrets.
